tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE daily_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  activity TEXT,
  accomplishment TEXT,
  reflection TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE daily_activities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    activity_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    duration_hours INT
);
CREATE TABLE daily_activities (id INT PRIMARY KEY, activity_name VARCHAR(50), activity_date DATE, description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE accomplishments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, accomplishment_name VARCHAR(50), accomplishment_date DATE, notes TEXT);
CREATE TABLE reflections (id INT PRIMARY KEY, reflection_date DATE, reflection_text TEXT);
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), location VARCHAR(50), start_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE remote_work_life (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    hours_worked DECIMAL,
    satisfaction_level INT,
    date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    country VARCHAR(255),
    join_date DATE
);
